name: Automatic Quests
description: Never forget to claim a quest again!

issues.info: You can report issues on the mod's Github page!

disable-mod.name: Disable Mod
disable-mod.description: Main toggle for the mod. Disables all functionality and visual effects.

auto-claim.name: Disable Auto Claim
auto-claim.description:
Disables the quests from automatically being claimed when you complete them. This is useful when you want to disable the main mod functionality while still keeping the visual effects in the quest bar.

Also disables the diamond collection effect when completing a quest.

quest-preview.name: Disable Quest Preview
quest-preview.description: Disables showing the "New Quest" preview for the next upcoming quest in the quest notification bar.

quest-diamonds.name: Disable Diamond Effect
quest-diamonds.description:
Disables the diamond collection effect in the "New Best" screen and "Level Complete" screen that plays when you complete a quest.

Doesn't affect actual quest rewards, the rewarded diamonds will still be added to your profile.

quest-time.name: Notification Time
quest-time.description:
Controls how long the quest notification bar stays on screen, in seconds. This does not have an effect when the quest preview is disabled.

The default vanilla behavior is 3.2 seconds.
The default behavior for the mod is 4.0 seconds.
